attributes.action: Ban face coverings for ALL in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Other European countries have banned it so I think it's time we did the same.
attributes.background:
I'm a disabled person and have noticed a rise in face coverings in my local town and can't go near them. 

Yesterday I saw online as a person attacking someone with homophobic abuse was wearing a cover hiding their identity. 

It poses a serious risk and should be banned immediately.
